title: Gruntilda's Lair
description: Main Hub World. A number of clips can be done to skip level entrances and note doors. Some are harder than others.

general.name: Switchless Grunty Statue Jiggy
general.description: You can clip into the Grunty statue near BGS to get the jiggy underneath without hitting the grunty switch.

general.name: Switchless Coffin Jiggy
general.description: By jumping onto the coffin and rolling into the corner it is possible to get the jiggy inside without opening the coffin.

outofbounds.name: 450 Note Door Skip
outofbounds.description: This clip is achieved much in the same way as FP early, except the movement you do after clipping is different.

outofbounds.name: 640 Note Door Skip
outofbounds.description: With the water raised to level 3, you can clip out of bounds using a pipe and jump into the loading zone behind the 640 door.

outofbounds.name: 765 Note Door Skip
outofbounds.description: As the bee you can get out of bounds above the 765 door and get to places in the lair that the bee is not allowed be in. This video also covers the RBA section for 100%/

outofbounds.name: Door of Grunty
outofbounds.description: You can get behind the final door in teh game without opening it. This trick is one of the more difficult in the game, but it's not impossible.
